attributes.contentHtml:
Hi, firstly there has already been a post on ViaHost, but this one is including Bad himself in it.

You have already seen all the stuff ViaHost has done.
https://winterhoax.com/d/118-viahostgq-free-hosting/86

Ok. So His website STILL doesn't have a ToS nor privacy policy. viahost.ml and viahost.gq, even though its been a week.

So I was talking to Jedrik about how fucking messed up ViaHost was, they overallocate, and use a 16gb vps, all the proof is in their discord lmao.

Bad recently threatened to DDoS Heimsnet.
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/664231419417198596/764868893252255765/unknown.png
And said the same for gamehosting.gg but I couldn't find a screenshot.

Once starting a 1.16.3 server, I waited 5 minutes without getting past loading libraries. and he thinks that it beat mchost because its smaller, although the reason mchost was overloaded was because it was very popular at the time, unlike viahost with 40% global cpu usage.

Recently Bad banned me and decided it would be a cool thing to delete my minecraft server's files (MinePhaze) because I said I would take down his panel (php artisan down) due to him banning me for no reason, and the panel was also breached lmao because ThatBad doesn't know what he's doing.

He also doesn't know what SSH is. I asked him this but cannot get screenshots anymore since I got banned from the discord for simply telling the truth?

He also said in dms or smth that 10 minutes startup time was fast LMAO



professional management group name

also impatience

and he is 12 too lol

attributes.title: ViaHost, Sryden, ExoHost, AltHost, HelioNodes, BlockNode | Bad/Layer

attributes.contentHtml: J0SH LMAO 12 years old, what the heck. That guys parents can't afford any condoms
